episodes.title: The Irish Gang That Terrified New York City – The Westies
episodes.description:
Dive into the shocking true story of The Westies, the Irish-American gang that terrorized New York City throughout the 1970s and 80s. Operating out of Hell’s Kitchen, this crew became infamous for their extreme violence, loyalty pacts, and chaotic criminal empire.

From alliances with the Italian Mafia to brutal internal betrayals, their story is a disturbing yet fascinating piece of NYC’s criminal history.

Hashtags:
#Westies #TrueCrime #NYCHistory #IrishMob #OrganizedCrime #Hellskitchen #HistoryDocumentary #CrimeStory #MafiaHistory #DarkHistory

Disclaimer:
This video is for educational and informational purposes only. It does not promote, glorify, or encourage criminal activity or violence. All events are presented based on documented historical sources. Viewer discretion is advised due to graphic subject matter.
